subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Less than a year after Kelvin Sampson arrived at Indiana from Oklahoma with a U-Haul full of problems, the Hoosiers are playing U.C.L.A. on Saturday in the second round and fans are chanting his name.
snippet: Less than a year after Kelvin Sampson arrived at Indiana from Oklahoma with a U-Haul full of problems, the Hoosiers are playing U.C.L.A. on Saturday in the second round and fans are chanting his name.
